name: Name of the event
id: The slug for the event: Don't provide 'id' if a dedicated page doesn't need to be created for the event
calls_for_papers_deadline: Date format: yyyy-mm-dd, If the event has a calls For Papers

location.online: true: if the event is online. Default: false
location.location: Location of the event. If hybrid, add online at the end. For example, 'Banghok, Thailand and online'

links: Any additional links should be added here like the example below

speakers.type: Type of the speaker: Panellist/Invited/Organizer, etc.
speakers: Information about each speaker: Name and Institution

speakers.type: Type of the speaker: Panellist/Invited/Organizer, etc.
about: Information about each speaker: Name and Institution

multiday_schedule: Only given if the schedule is for more than one day
one_day_schedule: Only given if the schedule is for one day only
